website_summaries.verdict: Boasting an attractive design and a multilayered construction, this set of two anti-fatigue kitchen rugs delivers a pleasing balance of style and comfort.
pros: Cushioned to minimize strain and pressure while standing
Non-slip rubber backing doesn't shift or slide
PVC leather surface is easy to wipe clean
Comes in several colors and fun patterns
Set includes a runner and a mat
cons: Some complaints of a chemical odor

customer_reviews.title: Mat
customer_reviews.text: Does what a mat should do. Easy to wipe off and clean
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hotinger

customer_reviews.title: Look Better in Person
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered these...I was like- what was she thinking! Well, I was wrong, I love'm!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I think these mats are very pretty and cute but they are thin. I had read a review about the fact that they were rolled up was gonna be a problem but it wasn’t. They flattened out completely as soon as I put them out. I really do like them but I just don’t think they were really worth $40. I would say maybe $20 or $25 at most. Wish they were thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: works well in a home with lots of pets
customer_reviews.text: After years of foot pain/problems I am very particular about having padded work spaces in my kitchen. With many pets in our household I was constantly washing rugs from tracked in dirt, etc. These mats provide me the foot comfort I desire and when I get pet prints, mud, and spills on them I can just wipe them down. They stay very well in place and do not slide. The long runner ran all the way from the sink to the cabinets bordering it, and the smaller pad fits in front of the stove giving me both comfort and protection for the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but thin
customer_reviews.text: I love how they look. But I was expecting them to be a little thicker for the price. I have another one in front of my stove I paid a lot less for and it's amazing wish I could remember the company I got that one from.. But these are very cute and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beware of bad spelling.
customer_reviews.text: Beware the spelling and the wording is all wrong. It would be good if not for that. We used a sharpie to make it better. But it's still weird. We didn't pay enough attention to what it said. We didn't return it. But wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Nancy M

customer_reviews.title: Faded and slippery
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 weeks, the ends are already fading. I am so disappointed. The first few weeks they looked so nice. Also - the description reads they are non skip - that is not true.
customer_reviews.author: chicken_nugget

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean at all!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and my family loves them! But cleaning them with Clorox wipes, it was not easy! Had to put some muscle into it AND the pretty color was coming off! I was expecting them to be easier to clean and I did not think ink would come up with the dirt! Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Durability and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised just how thick these are. Very comfortable to stand on for a long period. I have spent many days this season canning and find them to be the perfect accessory! No vacuuming....just sweep and go! Purchase highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: PJLG

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Thick! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these mats! Super cute! And they are so easy to clean. They really help with standing and doing my dishes. They don't slip around and they feel great! I don't recommend standing on them with shoes. They kind of stick to shoes. But socks or bare feet is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These mats are of nice quality. They go greatly in my farmhouse inspired kitchen. They are very comfortable to stand on for long periods of time. Very easy to clean and seem waterproof. Will buy more when or if these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ok rug set
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t care for this, they are too thin and not wide enough, didn’t like that they came rollled up because it is hard for them to lay flat after being rolled in the box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: MBurcham

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and lovely . They're great for my old rickety body and very economical for my big old dogs to lay on instead of mats made especially for dogs , especially in hot weather . They like hanging out in the kitchen anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kay Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very thin and small for the price. U can get better quality elsewhere. I bought for the color theme.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Renee

customer_reviews.title: Anti fatigue????
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is adorable. But definitely wouldn’t call these anti fatigue mats. They provide minimal to no support when placed on a hard surface such as tile. I’m pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Olson

customer_reviews.title: Color fades and comes off
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the cute design not necessarily for comfort. I loved them at first but I have only had them on the floor for a few weeks and they are starting g to look terrible. The color is fading and coming coming completely off in some places and the white color has a yellow hue now. For how much I paid I was expecting them to last longer. Not impressed, poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats. The lengths are perfect for our kitchen. The color is beautiful. And the squish mat assists with back pain
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy on the feet, but the design has worn off and faded very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats and was so excited to find them. Unfortunately they 1.) stain easily, and 2.) the print wears/fades off pretty quickly making them look dirty and dingy. Wouldn't buy again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tiberius

customer_reviews.title: Great mats
customer_reviews.text: Received these mats Saturday was waiting a week first order got lost but the good part the second order came so happy they are so wonderful not to high but more then enough support and comfort l have RA Iin whole body and standing in painful so these mats are so comfortable to work on .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Just for show, do not use them!
customer_reviews.text: I have had them down for about 2 days and the color is coming off and they look dirty already. These are not heavy duty at all. Not worth the price at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the thickness based on some of the reviews, but the thickness is fine. They are very comfortable and I love the color! Now if I could just keep my kitten off of them I would be good. I may be ordering more if she keeps clawing at them. :( The top of the mat is on the softer side, not hard like my older foam mats, so her claws are messing them up some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and cushy but wears very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the buffalo check plaid look of these kitchen mats! The only thing I’m not too happy with is they wear very easily. I do like how cushy they are to stand on but they already look so worn and discolored in only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: JBbooklover1

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but small
customer_reviews.text: This products checked all boxes but the size was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tron

customer_reviews.title: Buffalo Plaid Mat
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and product. Easy to wipe clean. The longer mat can also be used on a wooden bench as padding.
customer_reviews.author: Moscato

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: They soak up water easily and if you have pets it’s a bad idea. Our dog has put holes in them already
customer_reviews.author: Ahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Essential buy
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. With kids and dogs I need something easy to clean but that looks nice as well. These are so nice and well made!! Added a great touch to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love them ❤️but my cat loves them more - she scratches them so I have to move them to another room 😢but they are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Mary DeMange

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great combo - purchased to use runner under a dart board
customer_reviews.author: kelly sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but feels great! Perfect size for my kitchen, one in front of oven and one in front of sink. My back already feels better from standing on kitchen tile floor. A little pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, style and ease of these rugs. They aren't super thick and comfy, but I needed it to be thin near the door so it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn HR

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: They do look a little cheap for what the picture showed. Also easy clean up on some things but others did not come off with anything! And took the design off. Mats were ruined within 3 days of receiving. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen mats, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mats. Easy to clean. Pretty design. Practical. They just don’t give a high end look. But it is a kitchen so since we like to cook, practical is probably better than aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cook

customer_reviews.title: Cute but narrow width
customer_reviews.text: Cute design just a bit narrow as far as width goes but I probably didn’t realize that reading the dimensions prior to ordering
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't have pets
customer_reviews.text: Loved these mats when I first got them. Unfortunately, they are not easy to clean, and when my car walks across them, her nails poke the surface and now it looks terrible. Be careful if you have cats, this will not hold up long.
customer_reviews.author: E Seebeck

customer_reviews.title: Black and white check foam mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are perfect fit for in front of my sink and my stove where I'm standing most of the time. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Terrysmith

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. Way too thin certainly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase, would not recommend to anyone. They are very hard to clean, if someone walks over them with shoes they leave boot marks and imprints. They constantly look dirty. Not good value, wish I didn’t waste over seventy dollars buying two sets of these.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Keith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful and keep my feet nice and comfortable! Color is like a blueish mint
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pilgram

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats
customer_reviews.text: These fit great with my decor..plus cushion is nice for doing dishes. The colors fade after cleaning
customer_reviews.author: ralph724

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The mat is sticky and stains easily. Not so good quality, I would suggest spend little extra money and get a better quality mat.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I love mine! Adorable in my kitchen. Quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice look in my kitchen. Wish it was a few inches wider. But it is serving purpose. 2 long rugs in front of sink.
customer_reviews.author: BOBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Simple, beautiful, and comfy mats with unbeatable price! Would buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The mats are really cute and I love the long runner style for my kitchen. I have had these for a while and around the edges I have noticed fading. Still cute but may be better in a lower traffic area.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Worth every $
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month! love it! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: They’re beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I like them!! Great quality for the money!! But they are not easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Roylan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our camper, cozy and comfortable on the feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grote

customer_reviews.title: Not true anti-fatigue mats
customer_reviews.text: Not traditional anti fatigue mats at all and way smaller than normal kitchen mats. Will definitely be returning. They are more of a cheap memory foam bath may than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little more green than expected
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is that these have a little more of a green tint than expected. So they don't quite match my other decor, but still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: *Brooke*

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cheap! Too expensive for quality of product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is VERY thin and cheap looking. Definitely not worth $40!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen mats
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these. Comfy on the feet but were not anti slip like description said. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is just “OK”. If you want a quality rug set this is not it
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a bit higher quality in the print and also the comfort provided but it didn’t cost much either
customer_reviews.author: Jody burns

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These have faded within 3 months of use. Wish they lasted longer bc I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I use these mats in my kitchen. They are very comfortable, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like how it looks, BEAUTIFUL, and very good quality. I'm super happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Willis Family

customer_reviews.title: Good looking small mat
customer_reviews.text: It's good for being a waterproof mat without too much thickness.
customer_reviews.author: ChiuHao-Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Product as described. Great colors. Great material for keeping clean and not fading.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in my kitchen. Great mats for the price.
customer_reviews.author: INDIRA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Waterproof and Non Slippery Kitchen Mat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered sunflower design Kitchen Mat which looks beautiful on my kitchen floor. Its water proof, non slippery and very easy to clean. So far I have not seen any stains on it. The length is also pretty good which completely covers the area below my sink and dishwasher. It also feels good to stand empty foot on it rather than on my cold tile.
customer_reviews.author: S.TIK

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time in the kitchen almost every days. I dont like to wear socks or slippers. And I do not like to stand on hard cold tile floor. Kitchen mat is one of necessary accessories to me. These mats are so comfy. It is really comfortable to stand up for short or long period of time. More, it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. These are a good size, comfy to stand on and water proof. Perfect for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: x_burnt_ginger_x

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kitchen and they are perfect. Super comfortable and the long one is bigger then expected. Absolutely love them so far. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug set in mid-August. I am disappointed to say that both are now in the garbage. The pattern is very nice and it is comfortable enough compared to other lower priced anti-fatigue mats, but both have not held up at all. The top layer is not thick enough and has torn in several places. The smaller piece actually has chunks that have come up from it. I only wear flats, sneakers, and socks so I it is simple wear and tear, not something like a high heel or other shoe issue. Very disappointing considering I really liked them. I would have expected them to last much longer and would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Verdict is still out
customer_reviews.text: I received these rugs today. They were rolled very tightly together in one package. After opening them and placing on the floor I notice both have a hugh wrinkle at the end of the rugs (this is where the smallest part of the rolled rugs were) The rugs have flattened during the day, but the wrinkles are still very noticeable. It looks like the rubber crease goes all the way through the rugs. I have ordered other padded mats and have not had this problem. Going to give it a few days. If still there I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Green

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed why my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in my purchase I bought them 2nd week of April only had for 6 weeks. One is faded so bad that I’m trashing it very soon ( as soon as I choose another) The set i bought came with 2 a large and a smaller size. The least high in traffic was the one that faded, but the other one in front of the fridge which is a high traffic area when you have teenage boys looks good. Can’t say why, but I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Comfy mat
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product was gray, but it is a taupe color. (I asked about the color, but never got a reply). Does not match my kitchen. But my boyfriend liked it, so I gave it to him instead of dealing with the return. Also, it was supposed to be 18" wide, but was only 17". It is very soft and comfy to stand on, though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Look nice
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice. Easy to wipe off. Do not use vacuum cleaner on them. Some of the color came off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Extremely comfortable a d look cute in my laundry room
customer_reviews.author: Concerned buyer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: They are 2 different colors and the small one keeps moving. They’re comfortable, still debating on keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: non-slip???
customer_reviews.text: the mat looks great, good shipping but non-slip i don't think so. this thing moves around all the time. I have seen thicker, more comfortable ones that don't move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at the sink
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Not as thick or comfortable as i was hoping. My kitchen sink is in a corner so there was no way to to use the mats to cover that area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats! They make cooking some much more enjoyable! Very pretty and unique
customer_reviews.author: team Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Mats
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the material but they look great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Matt
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, very comfortable, does not slip around on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, good size, could be a bit thicker but just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Graziani

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love every thing about the mat comfort and style looks great on my kitchen floot
customer_reviews.author: sylvia robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are in my black and white kitchen and I really love them.
customer_reviews.author: heather kelly

product_meta.title: Kitchen Mat Set, KIMODE 2 Piece Anti Fatigue Kitchen Floor Mat Comfort PVC Leather Heavy Duty Standing Mats Waterproof Rubber Back Non Slip Kitchen Rugs, 18" x 29"+18" x 47"
product_meta.description:
Size:18" x 29"+18" x 47"| Color:Egg Beater

If you’re looking for a kitchen mat which has the features Non-slip,waterproof,anti-oil, rubber backing design,why not choose our PVC material carpet? 

Material:

Eco-friendly PVC Leather with Nature Dyestuff and environmental adhesive,safety mat,so that you can focus all your energy to enjoy the cooking time.

Feature:

--Advanced beveled edge and super non-slip bottom to prevent tripping.

--PVC Material against water/oil/hair and other dirt,easily wipe with damp washing cloth or a little mild detergent.

--Fashion design pattern ,decorate your kitchen and change the way about work,and make your kitchen bright and better to reflect your taste. 

Package:

2 x PVC Mat.

Notice:Please note this PVC Mat can’t absorb water,but waterproof and slip resistance,to ensure you have a safe activity.
feature_bullets: Cushioned Kitchen Mat and Runner Set: 10 mm thick anti-fatigue comfort mats provide ample support for your foot and knees over long periods of standing when used as a standing desk mat, kitchen chef mat.

Waterproof and Oil Proof Mat : Made of high quality PVC leather, it can withstand spills or kitchen disasters. Clean surface pattern design will provide a warm and bright accent for any home. Strong enough to use in high traffic areas.

EASY TO CLEAN : Simply wipe clean with a damp cloth or sponge, use any common household cleaner or sweep clean of dirt and dust, use any common household cleaner or sweep clean of dirt and dust, save your time and energy.

Non-skid Comfort Kitchen Mats: Comes with non-slip rubber backing for added safety and stability. Works on multiple surfaces (wood, ceramic, laminate, marble, concrete, etc). Safe to use around kids and pets. Low profile design so doors won't get stuck.
2 Piece Set Kitchen Rug and Runner: 18"x29"+18"x47" a set, you can used as a standing desk mat, kitchen chef mat, doormat, bedroom rug , kid's room rug or other anti-fatigue mat application.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars300 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
